QuestData.Title: Might Makes Right
QuestData.Description: You have done well to report this crime. The perpetrators of this heinous act will be punished. There will be blood.$B$BI will need a new General now that Grebo is dead. You shall take his place.$B$BMeet me at Cliffwalker Post, General. Together we will end this nonsense.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Overlord Krom'gar at Cliffwalker Post in Stonetalon Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: The traitorous tauren will now stand by as we destroy his precious grove and burn his village to the ground!
